“Well, crap.” Isabel said as she jiggled to door to no avail. She saw a flyer explaining that the gym was “closed temporary for emergency renovations.” Apparently the 30 year old wiring finally gave out leaving the entire building in the dark. Come to think of it, Isabel could have taken a hint by how pitch black the complex was and saved her about 20 seconds of running to the door. To go without mentioning, this threw a wrench into her plans of exercising but she had bigger problems to deal with.

“God, I am freezing!” Isabel exclaimed. To get herself warmed up, Isabel decided to jog to the gym today. The weather didn’t seem too bad at first. Sure, it was cloudy but she could still see the sun and everyone else seemed fine with light coats and scarves. The conditions seemed relatively adequate to her until she spent the previous minute contemplating on her change of plans. The blistering cold hit her like a brick wall and she immediately wrapped her arms around her chest.

The hair on Isabel’s arms were standing on end and she could feel her nipples start to poke through her bra. She wanted to rush back home and change into more appropriate clothing but what was once a light jog from her apartment became a trek to the top of Mount Everest and back in her eyes.

Where to now?

Most of the complex was just an echo of the shops that existed years ago; except for the donut shop and deli across the parking lot. It was probably reaching 7 in the morning by now and it would be another half-hour of waiting before either store opened. A gust of wind further implanted the idea in Isabel’s mind that it would be useless to stay here.

Taking the path back to her apartment, Isabel tried to warm herself up by jogging but the ever-present cold kept her to walking with hands desperately rubbing every exposed part of her body. “W-Wh-What the hell is with this weather?!? I feel like I’m going to die of hypothermia if I don’t get-” she cut herself off when she saw it.

It was just another unit of the coffee chain that seemed to reside in 54% of the buildings on the planet and local solar systems. She was pretty sure this was the fifth one she passed today. The establishment itself was compact to say the least. One could easily miss it if that gaudy recognizable sign wasn’t out front. Though none of these particular facts registered in Isabel, the only thought in her skull as she stood there, hunched over and her breath shaky, was “the miracle lighting of the ‘Open’ sign.”

“T-Thank god,” Isabel cried as she imagined her sudden reunion with warmth...

She mustered up all of her energy, readying herself as if was about to pounce through the door!

Though her interests in these items would fade away, one thing that seemed permanent in her life was her motherâs loving tone which continued to be finely-woven throughout her every action. 9:06:32 AM

Isabel put on her gray shorts and white sports bra to go out for a morning jog, something she regularly did. She then put on her white socks and sneakers and left her house. She ran to the park that was two blocks away. Soon after she got there, she saw an older woman staring up at a tree. She turned to talk to Isabel.

“Excuse me,” she said. “I need some help.”

“What’s wrong?,” said Isabel.

“My cat is stuck in this tree. Can you get her down?”

Isabel looked up. It was a tall tree, and the cat was high up. She couldn’t even see it. Branches and leaves were blocking her view. But she could hear it. She was confident she could get it. “Sure.”

As Isabel climbed up the tree, she had to get past many branches.

Science fiction can be interesting and fun, but it can also mean a variety of things. Not every science fiction story takes place in worlds far from our own, or even on an Earth that is itself scientifically advanced. So, what kind of sci-fi setting will Isabel be bared in?

Galactic ENForcer: In a far-flung space setting, interplanetary travel is not only a possibility, but practically a necessity. With friction between alien species, cosmic horrors, and the dangers of uncharted worlds, ENForcers like Isabel fly to the front lines, be it for diplomacy, combat, or exploration.

World of Tomorrow: This story is set on Earth, but the Earth of 20XX, where all sorts of futuristic technology is common, and even more is being developed day by day. Of course, that doesn't mean every body has a great time trying to use these futuristic contraptions, and certainly more than a few people have started to use them for less-than-wholesome means...
